name: Look up
description:
Description

This is my first completed game :) It was made for Ludum Dare 38 COMPO

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/look-up

Game is very simple. You must avoid meteorites and survive as long a you can.

Controls

wasd - move

RMB - rotate view

Scroll - zoom

Esc - menu

Tools Used

Unity

Gimp

Audacity

Blender

Bosca Ceoil
